extDescription.message: A simple web page to markdown tool

extMsgSelect.message: The selected text mode has been activated. Please move the mouse to select and support ESC to exit.

extMsgRemoveAD.message: The removal ad mode has been activated. Please move the mouse to select and support ESC to exit.

extMsgSelectNoOut.message: The content is saved successfully. Please select the export format.

extMsgNoSelect.message: No content selected, please select content first.

extMsgOutErr.message: Save the error, it may be caused by too much content on the webpage, please save it directly as markdown.
